definitions.definition: The part of the body between the pelvis and the stomach .
A part of a piece of clothing that covers the waist.
The narrow connection between the thorax and abdomen in certain insects (e.g., bees , ants and wasps ).
The middle portion of the hull of a ship or the fuselage of an aircraft .
That part of the upper deck of a ship between the quarterdeck and the forecastle .

examples: The waist of a bell widens into the lip.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The part of the body between the pelvis and the stomach .
secondary_definitions: A part of a piece of clothing that covers the waist.
The narrow connection between the thorax and abdomen in certain insects (e.g., bees , ants and wasps ).
The middle portion of the hull of a ship or the fuselage of an aircraft .
( nautical ) That part of the upper deck of a ship between the quarterdeck and the forecastle .
